name: The Dungeon At Knight
description:
Welcome, to the dungeon. you will now observe the dungeon at knight.... 

use arrow keys to move and space to use your sword.

try to get to the other exit without waking up and cyclops. if you do, you have to battle! they can only see you in their line of sight (they look down) or by touching them. you cannot leave a dungeon if a cyclops or minotaur is awake. the minotaur shoots

lightning and has to be defeated to leave the dungeon. the game is beatable, you have to explore 10 dungeons, kill 10 cyclops, and kill a minotaur to summon KEYCLOPS. kill him, and you have the key to the dungeon and can finally escape How many dungeons can YOU go through? how many cyclops can YOU kill? find out in The Dungeon at Knight.

keep in mind this is pretty laggy and dungeons may take a while to load, some code has bugs that i cannot find so different measures have to be in place, do not restart the project if a dungeon is taking a while to load, it will load soon and this might not happen again through out your run. if you have ANY suggestions to ADD (not fix) then feel free to say so
